name: Miriam
greetingText: thought id be diffrent and make it a bit special
wishText: as you've done so much for me
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! blah blah.....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very special to me
outroText: id like to firstly thank you for always being there for me then id like thank you for leeting me stay with you, i never could have immagined id make it this far with you, you are a very special lady, you are strong and resiliant and against the test of time you are the victor....yesterday i told you that i didnt want to spectate, i told that i wanted to be there for u always...well now im here mimi and im not going anywhere....happy birthday mimi and i wish you many many more and ill be present for every single one!
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
